name: Extract Text from Image – ETFI
author: Sanatan Tech Innovation Pvt Ltd

sections.description:
Extract text easily from your images. Plugin uses Amazon Textract service which is a machine learning service that automatically extracts text, handwriting and data from images that goes beyond simple optical character recognition (OCR) to identify, understand, and extract data from forms and tables.

To display an extract widget on any page or post use shortcode [extract-text]. You have to enter the required AWS credential in the plugin setting screen. Refer below links to get credentials from your AWS account,

https://aws.amazon.com/textract/
https://docs.aws.amazon.com/IAM/latest/UserGuide/id_users_create.html
https://docs.aws.amazon.com/textract/latest/dg/security-iam.html
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1znTnPv35_XHGShMzIdXwNlkRFWAOl-Gc/view?usp=sharing

1.2.0

Initial release

1.2.1

  1. Change field label as below:
    S3_KEY to “Access Key ID”
    S3_SECRETE to “Secrete Access Key”
  2. Add the link of guideline
